body:
Ah, yes, the "gotcha, bitch!" post. Do you guys all follow a playbook? Because this shit is formulaic. 

Yup, Ive been found out! You've uncovered the truth of how I created a space for a purpose, explicitly defined that purpose, laid out a very relaxed code of conduct for that space, and then moderated that space fairly according to that code of conduct, all while operating with as much transparency as possible (re: we publicly log every mod action we take)

Congrats, Columbo, you've solved the case! The truth is exposed! I am vanquished! How ever will i recover? My guild is doomed!

body:
It’s easily observed when immediately after submitting a comment that should be buried in a 1on1 conversation gets 4-5 downvotes, just a few seconds later.
Then look at this “niggerkiller” account that is writing all caps in this post. It has been created just yesterday and basically only trolled here, made the same mistakes in grammar that other account made.
You can find more info on how to spot this behavior here.

https://cryptome.org/2012/07/gent-forum-spies.htm

If you’ve used certain forums on Reddit before or ever held unpopular opinions on sites like that before, you’ve run into these faggots.
body_html:
It’s easily observed when immediately after submitting a comment that should be buried in a 1on1 conversation gets 4-5 downvotes, just a few seconds later. It has been created just yesterday and basically only trolled here, made the same mistakes in grammar that other account made. You can find more info on how to spot this behavior here.

https://cryptome.org/2012/07/gent-forum-spies.htm

If you’ve used certain forums on Reddit before or ever held unpopular opinions on sites like that before, you’ve run into these faggots.
